amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 2003.

action.text: Mr. Taylor (NC) raised a point of order against the King (IA) amendment (A017). Mr. Taylor of North Carolina stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. King (IA).
